segments.text: Where is that cool guy , Dick ? I haven ’ t seen him for two weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He ’ s been sick since he came back from Italy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Bummer , I ’ m sorry to hear that , is he better now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Doctor William said that he could come back to work ASAP .
segments.speaker: S2
